<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12+"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Nosoi Charm](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1095)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Night of the Gray Death</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Night of the Gray Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=99) pg. 53

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Nosois serve as scribes and messengers to psychopomps. They are rare outside of the Boneyard, so it's common for [psychopomps](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=83) venturing to other planes to carry a nosoi facsimile to aid in their travels. This tiny icon of a masked raven emits twittering sounds in perfect accompaniment to your performances. You gain a +2 item bonus to [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks to play an instrument, orate, or sing. You can cast [_sending_](/Spells.aspx?ID=272) once per day as a divine innate spell. 

**Activate** <actions string="Three Actions" /> Interact;     **Effect** You twist the base of the charm, and the twittering it emits becomes helpful words to boost your arguments. You lose the item bonus to [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks and gain a +2 item bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks to make [Requests](/Actions.aspx?ID=51) until you use this activation again.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;     **Effect** You gain [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=21) as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet for 1 hour as long as you continue to hold the charm. This allows you to sense the life force that animates living creatures and the perverse force that animates the dead, though you can't distinguish between the two.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
